Official Miracle Money Method Reviews

<a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/miracle-money-method/">Make Money Online With Miracle Money Method</a>
Ladies and gentlemen, mark the 25th January 2012 day in your calendar, because The Miracle Money Method will be here! The team that brought us Mass Profit Sites decided to help once more, and created the amazing <a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/miracle-money-method/">Miracle Money Method</a>, which will revolutionize the entire world of internet marketing.

This product might be easily used by everybody, especially if you are not a fan of manually building your websites, adding affiliate links and driving the most wanted traffic. Let's see what Miracle Money Method does and find out how incredible it is.

The Miracle Money Method studies the current market and decides what's good for selling or buying, making these difficult decisions instead of you. Without you having to do anything else besides entering a few details on affiliate marketing, it will create and publish a high-quality website, ready 100% to help you cash-in good commissions. You won't have to find the product to sell and you won't need to loose hours learning HTML or web-desing in order to create your website. This product is created only for affiliate marketers, therefore you won't need a product of your own, customer service, marketing service. The only thing you'll need to do is only click a few clicks!

How Does Miracle Money Method Work?

After you are in the Miracle Money Method's member area, enter your Clickbank ID, which can be easily obtained for free, when signing up with Clickbank. Clickbank is the monetizing system that knows all your sales and pays you.

After this simple thing, the next one you need to do is even simpler… enter your Amazon ID. This will also help you cash-in commissions from top selling and high paying products from Amazon. After this has been made, you will be shown some top selling products from Clickbank, the category they are under and exactly how much they can pay for a single sale.

After the first 2 steps, The "Miracle Money Method" will reveal to you your sub-domain name, created by its software. What makes this product the king and the most powerful tool of affiliate marketing is that you don't need to worry about any technical details, and also that it is ideal for any beginner in the internet marketing niche. After this, The Miracle Money Method will automatically create your entire website, optimizing and ranking it well in Google.

This is the easiest available method to create marketing websites. And the surprises don't stop here! This amazing software at The Miracle Money Method will automatically create and add new high quality content to your websites, every week. Search engines such as Google rank you better depending on your website's content, so this is the best solution of gaining better ranking in the search engines.

Miracle Money Method Final Thoughts?

In a few words, The Miracle Money Method is the most amazing affiliate marketing software for anybody who has 5 to 10 free minutes a day – this is how long it takes for this program to completely create your high quality content generating, affiliate website.

Official Commission Breakthrough Review Page

<a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/commission-breakthrough/">Commission Breakthrough Software</a>
So what is this new product called <a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/tag/commission-breakthrough-review/">Commission Breakthrough Review</a> and should you buy it? Well, if you have bought any Internet marketing or affiliate marketing products lately, you know that many of them just don't stand up to the requirements most of us demand when we fork out cash for it. Commission Breakthrough is quite a bit different in which it offers a unique way for you to earn commissions.

This amazing new product, Commission Breakthrough, taps into an incredible source of traffic which most affiliate and Internet marketers don't use and are not even aware of to get some insane commissions. Unlike others, I'm not talking about sites such as Google, PPC and Facebook.. but it is 100% free traffic to make money online!

Commission Breakthrough is an amazing product for beginners and others who don't have much experience with affiliate marketing as it does most of the complicated work for you and get you start making money online.

Check out the video by clicking my picture below. The short video will tell you more about the product and how it works. Once you try Commission Breakthrough yourself, you will understand why it's becoming a primary tool for affiliate marketers worldwide. And that's a fact!

Commission Breakthrough Value Proposition
Creating a website today isn't really all that hard, especially if you own Commission Breakthrough. Anybody with the right mindset and an effective plan can have a website that people like. The challenge, however, is just where you get started. What is the most important thing is that you focus on bringing in traffic? Traffic to your websites is king, right? Obviously you won't be able to get anywhere if you don't have a steady influx of traffic. And, as we all already know, the best way to get more traffic flowing in to your site is to use the power of the largest search engines like Google. So what can you do to get Google's attention and help it love your website? And which steps are the most important for making sure that you are well ranked by "the big G?" The information below talks about three useful tips that will help you get a high ranking in Google for your targeted keyword…

One of the most important factors to focus on when working with Google is the content on your site. You can not steal content or have bad content. The content has to be original and useful. It is really difficult to come up with good content as a result of Google Panda. The content has to be of the highest quality in the eyes of Google. Google will not approve of low quality content. So, if you want Google to rank your site highly, then only provide quality content.

When you want to build your website's links, those links need to be natural. Don't make the mistake of buying links as that will most definitely shorten your chances of getting ranked in Google. You need to understand just how important it really is when you want quality and relevant backlinks. You'll find your search engine experience a lot more enjoyable if you do what I tell you and use ethical methods of gaining backlinks. Buying them is not the way to go. Newbies buy backlinks… But what the newbies fail to realize is over the long haul this can really damage your reputation.

Have you put a proper sitemap on your site? Google's spiders are able to index more internal pages if you have a proper sitemap. Your sitemap needs to be well-organized.

A sitemap makes your site easier to crawl for Google's spiders, which helps to index every page more easily. A sitemap is also excellent for other search engines to crawl your site more effectively, too. If you've used WordPress to create your site, there's a simple plugin you can use that will build a sitemap for you. It's as easy as a few clicks, and you're done.

There not just one thing that separates success and failure, but owning Commission Breakthrough will help. When you do it the way that Google wants, you will be on the right track. Just do the work and get in Google's good graces. You will see that your traffic increases with time. This will be your reward for doing what Google wants.

Commission Breakthrough does this for you and more.

Watch Ruthless Income Review

<a href="http://www.medicalsupportforum.com/Art/527539/90/Ruthless-Income-Launch.html">Download Ruthless Income</a>
Jamie Lewis has teamed up with Adeel Chowdry to create <a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/ruthless-income/">Ruthless Income</a>. I have followed Jamie Lewis for some time now and have enjoyed the content that he has created and have had some success with it. When I was notified about a new product that he is launching, I was quite eager to get on board to see what its about. BUT when I noticed that he was teaming up with Adeel Chowdry, I was a little skeptical, because I have never followed him except seen his name on many launches and product promotion via email. I cannot comment to much on Adeel as I have no history with him.

Having had success with Jamie in the past, I decided to give Ruthless Income a run to see how it works and write a review about it. ONE thing I do not do is just write a review for the sake of it. All reviews that I write, I have bought and tested and if they bring me some profits, I write up a review about it.

What you must know right from the get go is that Ruthless Income WILL NOT I repeat WILL NOT make you thousands overnight. If you think it will and also looking for something that will, then leave as you are just chasing myths. There is no such thing as overnight riches unless you have a daily budget of $10,000 and up to spend on advertising then go for it.

On the other hand what you will learn with Ruthless Income is finally how to market properly and Jamie and Adeel will teach you how to make commissions. With 1 on 1 training, they will teach you how to pull in conversions with great effectiveness. If you have struggled to make any sort of profits online, with Ruthless Income you will be on your way. Again this will not happen overnight and if you put into practice what they teach you and stick to it, you will succeed.

In conclusion, I do recommend Ruthless Income for the quality information and 1 on 1 training which will help you succeed. How can you make $1000 if you can hardly make $10. Ruthless Income will not leave you hanging after you purchase like most other programs. The sales video is hypey as its a sales grabber but they deliver on what they offer. There are many upsells which I do not recommend except for the first upsell as this compliments the program to the tee.

They also offer a 60 day 100% money back guarantee if for any reason this does not apply to you. I think you will be surprised and content as I am. All the best and I am off to apply what I have learned with Ruthless Income.

Honest SEO Link Monster Review

<a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/seo-link-monster/">SEO Link Monster Reviews</a>
SEO Link Monster is the latest offering from internet marketing sensations Brad Callen, Matt Callen and Dori Friend to help with your online marketing strategies. All three of these internet marketing superstars have released several high acclaimed products into the internet marketing world to help the everyday person make money online and be able to quit their jobs.

What is SEO Link Monster?
Currently specific details on <a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/seo-link-monster/">SEO Link Monster</a> are limited, but based on the reputation of Brad Callen and Matt Callen it is likely to take the internet marketing world by storm when it releases at the end of 2011. Most likely SEO Link Monster is going to be a system to rival link building services such linkvana and buildmyrank. For people not familiar with these services they are private blog networks (something the SEO Link Monster creators Brad Callen and Matt Callen have a lot of experience with) that allow you to submit articles which then get distributed across the blog network, building you high page rank links to boost your search engine rankings.

SEO Link Monster Scam
The pedigree of the Callen Brothers and Dori Friend would initially indicate that SEO Link Monster is going going to be far from a scam and another great product that will help boost your websites to the top of search engine rankings fast!

SEO Link Monster Cost
No cost has been directly put out for SEO Link Monster yet, however you can expect to see a sliding scale based on your needs, and it will most likely be a monthly fee, as with other similar services. As soon as a cost or pricing structure for SEO Link Monster is released, we will be updating this page with it, so bookmark us and check back soon!

SEO Link Monster Bonus
Here is the best bit! Even before SEO Link Monster is released I know that there will be endless people offering ebooks, video seminars and other recycled junk as a bonus if you buy SEO Link Monster through them. What you have to wonder is are any of these SEO Link Monster bonus packages going to help you get to the top of the search engines? No! What I am going to give you is something of real value that will directly help your rankings and support your purchase of SEO Link Monster. What I will give you if on launch day you come here and buy through us, is a multi tiered link wheel, which sells for over $200! This is the same system I use to get top rankings on competitive keywords, and it is yours for free! Check out the diagram below, bookmark this page and check back often for any updates!

The price will apparently be between $47 and $147 per month. So if it is similar to SEO Linkvine Elite and SEO Nitro I will definitely be interested in SEO Link Monster at those prices because they are low compared to $500+ per month.

I have also just learned that SEO Link Monster will provide "Personalized SEO Training" however I expect this will be from training videos and webinars. I wouldn't expect to get 1 on 1 coaching for $47 per month if I were you

SEO Link Monster

<a href="http://bryas59lfr.jimdo.com/2012/02/06/watch-ruthless-income/">honest SEO Link Monster Review</a>
This is the core of the SEO Link Monster system and it is a network of blogs where you are going to post articles with contextual links. All you need to do is to prepare an article and spin it, then add in the automation section and the system will distribute it randomly throughout the network so that you get powerful high quality backlinks which is really the best working backlinking strategy nowadays as it is a real white hat SEO not like other methods already killed by Google recent changes. some of the best properties is that the network uses different themes and your links are contextual links which is the best type of links and most important thing is that the sites use different IP hosting (I guess anyone understands SEO will know that this is a killer).
You have some few rules to follow but the most important one is that you are limited to 3 links per article (from my experience I suggest you add only 1 link per article which gives more value to this link instead of dividing this value over 3 links). Once you add an article it is distributed daily by the rate of 14 times per day (this means 14 links per 1 article per day for any URL). You get a full report of posted articles URLs that you can use to help quick indexing or just wait few days and they will be indexed alone. You can of course add as many articles as you want, sky is the limit actually.
Spinner:
The <a href="http://www.morefreeinformation.com/Art/479012/136/SEO-Link-Monster.html">SEO Link Monster</a> system comes with a built-in spinner in case you don't already have a good spinner software. You can use this spinner to spin your articles to get hundreds of different versions of different article which is the best SEO practice.
Rank:
A software to check your ranks is supplied so that you can aware of the improvement of your rankings, you can check the rankings of unlimited number of keywords. Another cool property is to check the top 20 keywords your site is ranking for with full analysis for each keyword so that you can find keywords you never targeted with good rankings which you can improve by adding some backlinks to these ones.
The above is the main SEO Link Monster system and there are also 3 upsells as follows:
1- Monster SEO Course: A complete SEO course that teaches different tactics and strategies of SEO these days. Whwn it comes from experts then you can be sure it deserves.
2- Article Monster Pack: I didn't get access to this but I guess from the name that these are packages of ready spun articles in different niches which you can use directly.
3- Software Programs: This is a mix of powerful SEO software (Niche Finder and Link Booster) that can help you a lot in your SEO business. I use the first one myself and it allowed me to get many great easy to rank keywords (it costs $97 alone) while the other is to help get your backlinks quickly indexed. These 2 are very powerful addition to your SEO package.
As I promised I'm doing a test with this system at the moment (I just got access yesterday) and I'll update you with the results soon.
This was my SEO Link Monster review where I tried as much as I can to put the product in the spot light and honestly I find this system very powerful and I do recommend it.

Get Ruthless Income Review

<a href="http://www.thearticlebeach.com/index.php?page=article&article_id=840795">Get Ruthless Income Review</a>
So as I said I got access to Ruthless Income a few days ago and I have been testing out the product. This new product comes from Jamie Lewis and Adeel Chowdhry. These two guys are extremely well known in the internet marketing industry and they have various products behind them. Jamie is actually one of my favourite internet marketers and his training is always very high quality!

So after getting access to the product I can reveal that basically the main product here is something called the "Parallel Conversion Puller" which is going to teach you how to make big commissions online. You're going to learn EXACTLY how Jamie Lewis and Adeel Chowdhry generate MASSIVE commission cheques using affiliate marketing. The great thing is that you're also going to learn a bunch of other cool stuff like domain flipping. Jamie Lewis often flips domains for extra cash and I have personally seen him flip websites for as much as $250,000 which is pretty insane!

I really love this product and here is why…

Ruthless Income teaches you the same strategies I am using the make a fortune, in fact I have learnt A LOT from Jamie Lewis. I am currently making between $300 and $1000 a day through affiliate marketing using the same techniques that are taught inside of <a href="http://bryas59lfr.wetpaint.com/page/Watch+Ruthless+Income+Review">Ruthless Income</a> and just recently I flipped 2 domains for a nice cash payday! The first domain I flipped for $10,000 and the second for $500. I'm actually about to flip another domain and I am hoping to get around $20,000 for it, so domain flipping is DEFINITELY something you can bank off. As I have explained though domain flipping is only a small part of Ruthless Income which allows you to make extra cash. Affiliate marketing is the main part of Ruthless Income which will show you how to make big commissions.

Click here to get access to Ruthless Income now

Ruthless Income Webinars..

Included with the main product is a bunch of webinars that Jamie Lewis is going to run. These webinars are basically just going to teach you the methods that Jamie is using to make a lot of money through affiliate marketing. The webinars are a great addition to the main product because they allow you to actually follow what Jamie is doing and learn exactly how to do this yourself. Jamie is well known for his high quality training and has helped literally 100?s of people to make money. If you want to really start banking a lot of money with Ruthless Income then these webinars will really help you.

Conclusion For Ruthless Income

I've taken a look at Ruthless Income and I am very happy with this product. You'll learn how to bank the big money using affiliate marketing and you'll get regular webinars that are going to help you stay on track and start making money. Jamie Lewis is one of my favourite internet marketers and I have learnt a lot from him. In the past 2 years I have gone from zero to making as much as $1385 in a single day and selling websites for $10k. Everything I do to make this kind of money is taught inside of Ruthless Income so if you are not making at least $10,000 a month online then I highly recommend picking this up.

Click the get access now button below to visit the official website for Ruthless Income:

Proof Of Income..

To prove to you that I really am making a lot of money online I have taken a screen shot of my income. Below you can see that I am making a lot of money. Inside of Ruthless Income you're going to learn exactly how to make this kind of money using affiliate marketing.

Andrew X - Cash Bullets

<a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/cash-bullets/">Cash Bullets Review</a>
Cash Bullets is the new product from Andrew X, he's a huge internet marketer so I expect this to be a top product! Andrew X has been around a while now and developed a good reputation for his internet marketing skills so this is definitely someone to learn from! He's been nicknamed the King of Clickbank (the online marketplace) so clearly he has experienced some huge success and people have a lot of respect for him.

As for the product, well I expect it to be a big one and I fully expect it to have the content and quality to give some important information and the potential to propel you towards experiencing some success online. I won't know this for sure until launch day on 9th February and you can check out my full review of the product then!

Although I expect this to be quality you can never be too sure. I've fallen victim to rubbish products before when I was starting off, I expected them to be amazing and I fell for all the clever marketing. It really frustrates me so I'll be giving a full honest review as soon as I get my hands on it and I'll let you know if it really is as good as they say!

In the mean time why not check out some of the guides and software that has helped make $2000 a week online! These are the best products available and I fully recommend them to anyone looking to learn more about internet marketing!

Hey guys, I just received access to Quick Click Commissions and I have been testing the software like crazy… so if you are thinking of getting a copy of this product but you are not sure yet because you want to know what <a href="http://bryas59lfr.posterous.com/watch-quick-click-commissions-reviews">Quick Click Commissions</a> is and what it does you are at the right place.

Before I continue with the review tho, I want you guys to check out the screenshot below which proves that I have access to the members area unlike many sites out there that claim that they have access to the product when they don't.

OK so with this out of the way let me tell you what Quick Click Commissions is all about.
Basically, QCC is a cool piece of software that uses the power of Facebook and the search engines to generate targeted traffic to affiliate offers from ClickBank and Amazon.

So how does this work?
Well it's very simple really; Inside the members area you can use 2 software's that can promote Amazon or Clickbank affiliate offers. The first software is the Amazon Dominator which is very simple to use all you have to do is enter a keyword for a product that you want to promote and the software will show you a list of hot Amazon products. From the list, choose a product and click on "Generate FB Cash Template":

After you generate your FB Cash Template all you have to do is to create a Facebook account and create a FB Page where you can paste the code that the Amazon Dominator software generated for you. Inside the QCC members area they have a step by step video training that you can follow on how to do this process. Once you publish your FB Note the final thing to do is to ping and build some links to the Facebook Note and that's pretty much it.

Now because the major search engines love Facebook in 1-5 days your Facebook note will get targeted traffic from all the major search engines like Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc. Because the traffic is super targeted and the costumers are already searching for the product that you are promoting you will start to generate sales and amazon will pay you for them

The second piece of software is Clickbank Dominator, basically this software does the exact same thing that the Amazon Dominator software does. The only difference is that this time you can promote ClickBank Offers.

Experience Huge Success Online With Affiliate Marketing

If you really want to see your business grow, you can do it online with affiliate marketing. The best way to sell something to a large number of people, especially if you don't have the resources to launch a giant multi-media advertising campaign, is to do it online. Not only can it help you reach a large market, it is a very cost effective means of marketing. You can do all of the marketing yourself online but the best thing that many business owners have found to see huge growth in sales is going online with affiliate marketing.

What going online with affiliate marketing does is enable you to use the talents of many experienced online marketers to market things for you. What they will do find ways to point people to your website. They know where to find the people who are most likely to buy what you are offering. Many will have websites that are focused on you niche that will either promote products like or related to yours or that are exclusively there to promote your site.

They will write or hire people to write articles that will tell people about the virtue of what you are doing and not only help build your credibility but point people in your direction. They will sometimes create short promotional videos and post them to YouTube. They will make do quite a few things that are all aimed at drawing attention to your website. They will create a marketing campaign for you and will only get paid if sales are made or if people go to your site. This largely depends on the type of agreement you have with them.

Some online with affiliate marketing campaigns will be straight commission, some will be paid per click to your website, some will be paid if the point someone who signs up on a mailing list or otherwise shows that they are genuinely interested and area a solid lead. Commission rates will vary. Some physical products that are sold on Amazon or other retailers will pay around 8-10% commission.

There are down-loadable products that have little overhead that have commission payouts of anywhere from 40-60%. This may seem like a lot but the theory is the larger number of affiliates you have marketing for you, the more sales you will get. The more money they stand to make on each sale, the more incentive they have to push your product or service and the more people you will have wanting to.

Commission Cheat – What is is?

A problem which lies within the IM industry is blind sales pages. You get a promotional email regarding anew product launch, you watch the video, read the sales page, yet you still don't know what your buying. Sounds familiar right?
Well, I was actually SHOCKED to see that the sales pitch provided by Commission Cheat actually shows you what your buying. I've been reviewing products for over 2 years now, and let me tell you a secret. If your told what you getting, BEFORE purchasing. Usually it means it's a SOLID product.

Commission Cheat is a 3-in-1 software which creates "viral money pages". These pages take advantage of the current trends and places them on your very own mini-site similar to YouTube, the only difference being is that YOU will be the one getting paid, not YouTube. Take a look at the image below:

As you can see, I have highlighted three things. There are Google AdSense ads at the top, a Clickbank advertisement below the video, and a Amazon widget to the side. Each one of these advertisements has your affiliate code embedded into it, meaning if the user clicks on one of them, you get a commission. Is Commission Cheat just another "push button" software?

No. It's more than that. Commission Cheat hosts the page for you, meaning you don't require domain names and hosting. It also tells you what's currently "trending" so you can be at the very front of it and capitalize. It has it's own unique algorithm which can predict whats about to go viral before it happens!
Not only does it predict the next big thing, it also grabs targeted visitors from all over the web and directs them to your page!
There are people on YouTube making well over six-figures per year, using this very same technology! For your own reference, feel free to read the below references which backup my claims: >> First YouTube Millionaire.

Clickbank.com is one of the largest and most popular marketplaces for digital products (ebooks and software).

It has the advantages of:

Having thousands of products under several categories including
All products are digital. This means that the product can be downloaded immediately rather than having to wait for it to be shipped.
Signing up as an affiliate to any product within the Clickbank marketplace is extremely simple
Let's look at how it's explained by The New CB Code. Despite these advantages, most Clickbank affiliates struggle to make a few hundred dollars per month. However, there is an elite few "super-affiliates" that are making well over $1,500.00/month.

These folks are using Clickbank to create and grow a successful online business with affiliate marketing.

How can you as new Clickbank affiliate achieve this? The following is a summarized lists of what would be required is the knowledge of how to:

1. The ability to find the most profitable products. With thousands of product available, The <a href="http://www.online-marketing-au.com?p=934">New ClickBank Code</a>, you have to be able to sift through the crowd and find the products that:

1.1 Pay good commission – at least $20.00

1.2 Are in great demand – You can find out which products are in demand by doing thorough keyword research.

1.3 Have a good sales page – try to promote products that you have brought because that means that the sales letter was good enough to convince you to purchase.

2. Create your own affiliate websites (sending visitors straight to the merchants website through your affiliate link is common, but terrible mistake).

Tips:

* One of the best kind of affiliate sites to create is a review site!
** When creating affiliate sites, think about ways to make your site unique

3. Create landing pages with an opt-in mechanism which allows you to capture the names and addresses of visitors. This is very effective. When you capture your visitors information, you can follow up with them, The New CB Code Review, which has been proven to increase your conversion ratio.

4. Once you have captured the names of your visitors and have built a substantial subscriber list, you have to how to convert them into buyers… and even better… long term customers.

5. Get FREE ‘targeted' traffic to your affiliate sites. There are a number of strategies which are free but are proven effective in getting quality traffic to your site. These include:

5.1 Writing articles and submitting them to article directories
5.2 Posting at forums and online boards
5.3 Using signature files in emails and forums
5.4 Surf for traffic exchange sites

These are some of the techniques currently being used by a handful of Super Clickbank Affiliates. The New ClickBank Code Review, These are the techniques you need to learn to start seriously increasing your earnings online.

Instant Access Authority Hybrid

<a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/authority-hybrid/">Instant Access Authority Hybrid</a>
Aidan Booth the guy from Buenos Aires, Argentina is launching his first own product on Tuesday 21st of February 2012 after years of working as an affiliate. I know Aidan from his only launch where he partnered with Brian G. Johnson to launch "Rank and Pillage", this course was awesome for SEO marketers as it was a detailed step by step blueprints and unlike most of guides in the market they covered different options to fulfill the blueprints whether with free resources or with little investment even outsourcing all the work. You can check Rank and Pillage via this link. This is why I had a feeling that this course would be a very valuable one too and so I decided to do my Authority Hybrid review to help you know what you will get this time.

Authority Hybrid Review:
I had an access to the members area and here's a screen shot from inside:

<a href="http://easy-website-seo.info/reviews/authority-hybrid/">Authority Hybrid</a> is a complete package full of training materials and tools as follows:
1- Core Product:
This is composed of 7 modules with over 40 video tutorials where Aidan shows how he build websites and monetize them step by step, here's a summary of these modules…
Module 1: Niche Research:
In this module you are going to learn how to find a profitable niche and what is the truth of different niche research myths. Finding a profitable niche is the corner stone of any successful business.
Module 2: Keyword Research:
Aidan covers here the advanced keyword research tactics which is crucial for any SEO business to target the right buyer keywords.
Module 3: Domain Names:
Here you will learn the criteria of choosing a winner domain name which by itself could give your site a big boost.
Module 4: Website Setup:
Step by step tutorials of building your websites and making it ready for monetization and SEO business.
Module 5: Monetization:
Here you learn the different methods to monetize your websites whether by products to promote or using Adsense,…etc. This is of course the main task you need to make money with your sites.
Module 6: Advanced SEO:
This is the module that makes this product very valuable as as I stated earlier SEO is the area of expertise of Aidan Booth. The most important thing here is that he is covering the recent SEO tactics that still work today as lately Google has undergone major changes that killed many tactics that were used in the past. You will learn step by step how to take your site from zero till you rank high on the top of page one of search engines. My advice is to follow all the steps the blueprints literally to get the results you want.
Module 7: Scaling Results:
This is very important as you need to analyze your results and see what is working and what needs to be revised then after fixing all the issues you need to take your business to the next level and this is what you will learn in this last module.
2- 22 Premium WordPress Themes:
You get 22 premium WordPress themes as a member of Authority Hybrid so that you can have a big variety of choice for different websites purposes. The difference between premium and free WordPress themes is that premium ones usually do what they say to do unlike the many bugs you may face with the free themes.
3- Content Packed Webinars:
You will have the chance to attend 5 different live webinars with Aidan where you have the chance to learn different strategies and get the chance to ask what you need live. Even if you missed any webinar you can still watch its replay in the members area. Each webinar is planned to be around 90 minutes.
4- Desktop Reference:
This is a summary of the main course that covers the main steps in nutshell without details to keep you on track and to help you always fulfill the whole blueprint without the need to check the entire course every time.
5- Forum Support:
This is a members private forum where you can meet people like you and share ideas together and find solutions to any problem with Aidan moderating the forum and offer the suitable support to his members.
6- Website Reviews:
Aidan will review your site if you asked for and tell you what is good and what needs to be corrected. This is very powerful part really.
7- Niche Starter List:

February 29, 2012 will mark a revolution in mass marketing technology, with the release of the auto SMS System. One of the central tenets of advertising strategy is to place the product and the message about its benefits before as many potential buyers as possible. The significance of the auto SMS System lies in its ability to reach myriad potential customers in a cost effective manner. The auto SMS System achieves this groundbreaking cost effectiveness via its ability to send mass text messages – containing product descriptions and messages – at no cost to the sender.

The auto SMS System review currently available on the web reveals that the system employs the most sophisticated SMS Marketing Software in existence, which allows the SMS broadcasting process to be executed at no cost to the sender. This unique feature of the auto SMS System makes it able to boost cost to profit ratios dramatically, while keeping advertising messages, salient, poignant and brief.

The auto SMS system review indicates that the system achieves this feat by detecting and isolating the unique email address assigned to every cell phone, which is capable of receiving text messages, and subsequently employing this address to send cost-free text messages. Additionally, the auto SMS System review reports another ground-breaking feature of the auto SMS System. Namely, the system possesses the ability to generate an extensive list of telephone numbers, using nothing but a catalogue of area codes. The system then tests each number, in order to determine whether it is assigned to a live cell phone capable of receiving ad-based text messages. Significantly, the entire system is automated, making complex ad campaigns simple to execute with only a few clicks of a mouse.
